info.name: Userstyles Inspired Dark
info.description: A userstyles website/forums dark style, that attempts to refine coverage throughout the website and forums. Note: Areas like forums administrator/moderator panels are likely somewhat unstyled. Tested in Firefox , Google Chrome, Opera with Openstyles Stylus. Feedback is welcome and appreciated =). ■ Install as UserCSS (Stylus Users) click here. To view the project page click here. To report any issue(s) click here. Sites Covered ■ https://userstyles.org ■ https://forum.userstyles.org
info.additionalInfo:
Most Android app ads removed in usercards and walking droid, overlay ads pages etc... Have a cleaner browser experience without constant nagging. To view full changelog click here. 
New: v1.2.7 beta - Date/Time:  05/01/2019
* fixed some inputs e.g msg box, add users to chat etc.
* styled some blue svgs to white
* added colon to author field in cards
* style page buttons color + border
* removed time/date tweaks
* bump to v1.2.7 beta
Feedback welcome. Enjoy :)
